name: Spot The Oddity
description:
# GAMEPLAY

- There are two windows and many candies put on both windows.
- Candies are changing in individual motion.
- The Player have to find different motion's candies between left and right window.
- If the time end or life is all gone, the game is ended.
- There are 5 levels(difficulty).


# CONTROLS

- This game only use mouse.
- With the left mouse button, you can click the button and choose the candy.


# FEATURES

- New concept of the 'spot the difference'.
- All levels are replayable unlike general 'spot the difference'.
- It's good for your vision and concentration.
